motar ratha nishpadana kshethraye dashaka athdakim sahitha, api gambaurin de paribhogika hariyatama illuma therum, salakiya yuthu ෙmotar sanrachaka nishpadanaya shuddha karyaya ha dadi thaththwa palana kramaya apata sadharana milakata honda thaththwaye nishpadana samaga apage paribhogika sapayimata awasara ape aramuna kirimata upakara kirima honda thaththwaye nishpadana laba ganima athara ape amma aakarshanayak aathathiya adu kirimata paribhogikayan.
